729290f-a.title: Richmond: Purdy Place - Seguine Avenue
729290f-a.text:
Purdy Place, at the N.E. corner of Seguine Avenue,
showing Purdy's Hotel. The house was built in 1690 (see Robinson's
1898 and 1907 maps).
May 14, 1932
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
729290f-a.folder: Purdy Place & Seguine Avenue, Staten Island, NY

729291f-b.title: Richmond: Purdy Place - Seguine Avenue
729291f-b.text:
Purdy Place, at the N. E. corner of Seguine Avenus,
showing Purdy's Hotel. The house was huilt in 1690 (see
Robinson's 1898 and 1907 apa)..
Novender 25, 1922
Sy William T. Davis threugh P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(2)
The sawe, at a later date. Purdy Place is on the
right.
1924
P. L. Sperr
NO NEPROUCTIONS
(3)
A view from Seguine Avenue.
May 14, 1932
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
729291f-b.folder: Purdy Place & Seguine Avenue, Staten Island, NY
